about_the_game:
There's absolutely no aliens! We all know they are a myth and nobody ever seen one!

There's No Aliens is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random aliens to find for each of them.

  • try out 2/9 levels
  • 3 Difficulty Settings
  • replayable with 20 aliens out of 60 selected for each play
  • hint system
  • zoom
  • achievements

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050

name: There's No Aliens Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
